attributes.action: Make car seat safety mandatory in ante-natal classes & run in childrens centres.
attributes.additional_details:
To help to reduce the number of children who are seriously injured/killled in car accidents due to being incorrectly restrained. Courses in children's centres to be open to all family members/carers who carry a child in their car so they can know how to safely restrain the child. 

Reference article from which.co.uk : "Rise in number of children injured or killed in car crashes,13% of children not properly restrained" dated 06/02/2015 quoting statistics from The Office of National Statistics.
attributes.background: Cover such topics as: correct placement/positioning of the car seat, correct use of the belted/iso-fix system, benefits of rear-facing, use of harness including positioning / twisted / degree of tightness of straps, dangers of padded jackets/snowsuits/blankets under the harness, position of buckle.
